StringTable.Label: ScoutingFleet_Dec
StringTable.String: Begins with a colony ship and three probes.

StringTable.Label: NocturnalAbility_SeasonOfWakingDescription
StringTable.String: Developed to work in cycles, each lasting 15 months.[BR][BR]Season of Waking: [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] and [HS=HS_Growth]Growth[/HS] are boosted. [BR][BR]{AMOUNT} months remaining.

StringTable.Label: NocturnalAbility_SeasonOfDreamingDescription
StringTable.String: Developed to work in cycles, each lasting 15 months.[BR][BR]Season of Dreaming: [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS] and [HS=HS_Influence]Influence[/HS] are boosted. [BR][BR]{AMOUNT} months remaining.

StringTable.Label: AllianceAscendant_CampaignDec
StringTable.String: The year is 2307. It has been decades since the Terran Alliance and their coalition were able to liberate the known universe from the evil Drengin Empire and their thralls.[BR][BR]The galaxy finds itself at peace (other than the continuing proliferation of Hyperdrive, which is allowing some of the aggressive "minor civilizations" to join the galactic stage.)[BR][BR]Today finds DL Bradley in charge of the Leathon system and its neighboring stars. Rumors are that a new civilization, the Xeloxi, is attacking freighters and extorting civilians into paying protection money. If these rumors are true, then something must be done...

StringTable.Label: Campaign_AllianceAscendant_OwnThreeMinorRaces_Dec
StringTable.String: Minor Civilizations have a single homeworld that will provide benefits when within a civilization's zone of control. Settle worlds and build starbases to extend your Zone of Control till there are 3 Minor Civilizations under your protection.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_AllianceAscendant_DestroyXeloxi_Dec
StringTable.String: The Xeloxi have been extorting and pillaging these systems long enough. Remove the Xeloxi from the sector by taking all their planets. You can use diplomacy to buy yourself time to build up a strong fleet, but conflict is inevitable.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_AllianceAscendant_EnsureMinorFactionsSurvive_Dec
StringTable.String: The Civilizations in this region of space have suffered enough. They've only recently achieved space-faring status and have been subjugated by immoral dealings since then. We must treat and protect them fairly to provide a true sense of security and gain their trust.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_TERRAN_Campaign_AllianceAscendant_StartupDescription
StringTable.String: It's been decades since the last galactic conflict. The known systems have been more or less at peace. There's been a shift, though; there are reports that a new civilization is conducting less than legitimate business. Rumor is that the Xeloxi, previously unknown, are responsible. The Terran Alliance must intervene, bring stability to the system, and deal with this Xeloxi group.[BR][BR]Minor Civilizations have been hurt the most, so a priority should be bringing them under Alliance influence. Once they're secure and the Xeloxi's stream of ill-gotten resources is cut off, the Xeloxi can be dealt with.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_TERRAN_Campaign_AllianceAscendant_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: When provided stability and protection, Minor Civilizations serve as a source of resources. Settling near and keeping them under Alliance influence will give a distinct advantage over the unscrupulous Xeloxi.

StringTable.Label: Terran_AllianceAscendant_System_Dec
StringTable.String: The Leathon system has a class 28 planet perfect for a human colony, making it the ideal location to establish a base.

StringTable.Label: ImpressCitizens_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people are owned by you. It is time they remember. Will provide a Colony Ship and a Constructor

StringTable.Label: ForcedLabor_Dec
StringTable.String: The people are working hard. They could be working harder.

StringTable.Label: ForcedTraining_Dec
StringTable.String: Trains thralls to increase target fleet experience.

StringTable.Label: RushNewCitizen_Dec
StringTable.String: Without using Durantium we can recycle scraps to quickly produce more citizens.

StringTable.Label: FleetIncreaseMovesEO_Dec
StringTable.String: Use our executive powers to focus our efforts onto a single fleet to optimize its speed.

StringTable.Label: MilitaryConstructionEO_Dec
StringTable.String: Focus our efforts to quickly supply manufacturing resources to a specific shipyard.

StringTable.Label: InfluenceBroadcast_Dec
StringTable.String: This module contains an optimized message certain to make others wish to assimilate to our culture.

StringTable.Label: PlanetTiles_Dec
StringTable.String: Increase this planet's use to our species. Adds +1 to its usable tiles. Should only be used on Core worlds.

StringTable.Label: PillageTheWeak_Dec
StringTable.String: Send our Gatherers through the population to take what is needed for the empire from those too weak to resist.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CrushedOurEggs_Dec
StringTable.String: We have received a report that you chose to destroy some 'bugs' on planet {PLANETNAME}. That was one of our hatcheries! We will make you pay for this!

StringTable.Label: Quest_CrushedOurEggs_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: It seemed like a good idea at the time.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CrushedOurEggs_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} will be troubled for awhile.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SentienceStripped_Name
StringTable.String: Using pods to enslave your own people

StringTable.Label: Quest_SentienceStripped_Dec
StringTable.String: Our surveillance systems indicate that you forced sentient beings into pods on planet {PLANETNAME}. These pods have rendered them into a state of mindless servitude. Such actions challenge the very essence of sentience and sapience. Your actions will not go unnoticed.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SentienceStripped_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: In our view, it was necessary.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SentienceStripped_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} will deteriorate significantly.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DiplomaticDrugFallout_Dec
StringTable.String: Your encouragement of the consumption of this powerful drug on planet {PLANETNAME} has led to a tragic event. The family member of a prominent member of our civilization was exposed to its addictive nature, and their life was cut short. [BR][BR]The gravity of this situation has been felt deeply within our diplomatic circles.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DiplomaticDrugFallout_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} are in a precarious state.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CosmicEyeTheft_Dec
StringTable.String: You dared to steal the Cosmic Eye from planet {PLANETNAME}. That ancient Precursor relic was under our protection and vital for our navigational endeavors. [BR][BR]Such brazen actions will have consequences.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CosmicEyeTheft_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: It held untapped potential for us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CosmicEyeTheft_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} will remain strained for some time.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SonicLarvaMassacre_Dec
StringTable.String: On planet {PLANETNAME}, you unleashed sonic weapons, killing our larval cousins. Those were younglings of our insectoid civilization. Your actions have deeply disturbed us, and retribution is in the air.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SonicLarvaMassacre_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: We perceived them as a threat.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SonicLarvaMassacre_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} are now fraught with tension.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MarsupialSlavery_Dec
StringTable.String: You have taken the semi-intelligent marsupial creatures of planet {PLANETNAME} and forced them into slavery. These beings are cherished within our circles, and your actions have invoked our wrath.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MarsupialSlavery_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: We saw potential for their strength.

StringTable.Label: Quest_MarsupialSlavery_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} have been damaged.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CrystalGenocide_Dec
StringTable.String: On planet {PLANETNAME}, you slaughtered our kind -- the sentient crystals. Every shard broken is a life lost, a consciousness silenced. The echoes of this atrocity will reverberate through the universe, and our anguish is boundless.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CrystalGenocide_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: We were unaware of their sentience.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CrystalGenocide_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} are shattered, much like the crystals you destroyed.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ToxicDelicacy_Dec
StringTable.String: The addictive food that you started exporting from planet {PLANETNAME} has reached our populations.[BR][BR]Its addictive properties have led to sickness and desperation among our people. This is an unforgivable act of negligence!

StringTable.Label: Quest_ToxicDelicacy_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} are now severely strained due to this oversight.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DigitalDelight_Dec
StringTable.String: While organic civilizations suffered due to the addictive food from {PLANETNAME}, we are very pleased with your plan to ruin organic lives. We thank you.

StringTable.Label: Quest_DigitalDelight_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: Oh. Yes. That was our evil plan all along.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SealNegligence_Dec
StringTable.String: Your failure to address the leaking seals on planet {PLANETNAME} has directly led to severe damage to one of our kind. [BR][BR]While you fleshlings may not see this as a problem, we will not forget it. This negligence is not acceptable, and it strains our relationship.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SealNegligence_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} are now compromised due to this negligence.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ShadowyThanks_Dec
StringTable.String: Your support of the black market on {PLANETNAME} hasn't gone unnoticed. Our agents thrive, and our profits surge. We value such partnerships.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ShadowyThanks_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: We recognize mutual benefits. That was totally our intention.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ShadowyThanks_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} have been significantly boosted due to this profitable association.

StringTable.Label: Quest_SafetyOversight_Name
StringTable.String: Our citizen was harmed on your planet

StringTable.Label: Quest_SafetyOversight_Dec
StringTable.String: During our visit to your factory on {PLANETNAME}, one of our members was inadvertently deactivated due to the safety measures you removed. We question your judgment on this!

StringTable.Label: Quest_SafetyOversight_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} have been strained due to this unfortunate incident.

StringTable.Label: Quest_NobleInjury_Dec
StringTable.String: A cousin from one of our most respected families was injured while touring your factory on {PLANETNAME}, due to the safety measures you removed. This incident is gravely concerning to us!

StringTable.Label: Quest_NobleInjury_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: We never intended harm to your kin.

StringTable.Label: Quest_NobleInjury_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} have deteriorated due to this grievous event.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CorporateArtemis_Dec
StringTable.String: Our trading partners on Artemis are singing praises of your leadership. The flourishing businesses on the planet are greatly benefiting our entrepreneurial ventures.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CorporateArtemis_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: Prosperity through partnership is our aim.

StringTable.Label: Quest_CorporateArtemis_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} have been bolstered by the thriving trade on Artemis.

StringTable.Label: Quest_OpportunisticArtemis_Dec
StringTable.String: Thanks to letting your corporations running wild on Artemis, we've managed to gain a significant advantage in our endeavors. Every opportunity is a path to dominance, and you've provided us a great one.

StringTable.Label: Quest_OpportunisticArtemis_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: Every opportunity seized brings us closer to prosperity.

StringTable.Label: Quest_OpportunisticArtemis_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:1} find common ground in seizing opportunities.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EmbracedPacifism_Dec
StringTable.String: Your biography has shed light on your pacifist principles. This resonates deeply with us. We see you as a beacon of hope in these turbulent times.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EmbracedPacifism_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: Peace is the true path forward.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EmbracedPacifism_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} gains trust among pacifist civilizations.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ExplorerPassion_Dec
StringTable.String: Your biography speaks of your insatiable curiosity and passion for exploration. We, who cherish the thrill of discovery, find a kin spirit in you.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ExplorerPassion_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: The universe is vast and full of wonders.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ExplorerPassion_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:2} is viewed favorably among exploratory civilizations.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ConquestPraise_Dec
StringTable.String: Your biography details a thirst for conquest, a quality we find commendable and worthy of respect.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ConquestPraise_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: The stars are for those who have the might to claim them.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ConquestPraise_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:2}'s ambitions are recognized and appreciated by warrior civilizations.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ConquestDismay_Name
StringTable.String: Dismay at your blood lust desires

StringTable.Label: Quest_ConquestDismay_Dec
StringTable.String: Your biography speaks of a hunger for conquest and dominance. Such bloodlust has deeply troubled us.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ConquestDismay_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: Peace is the true path to prosperity.

StringTable.Label: Quest_ConquestDismay_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Aggressive ambitions of {PLAYERFACTION:2} disturb peaceful civilizations.

StringTable.Label: Quest_RiseOfACrimeLord_Name
StringTable.String: You are a rising crime lord

StringTable.Label: Quest_RiseOfACrimeLord_Dec
StringTable.String: You are rising as a criminal power thanks to your work on {PLANETNAME}. We should discuss potential ventures.

StringTable.Label: Quest_RiseOfACrimeLord_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Our reputation among criminal entities has improved.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnslavedNativesRepercussions_Dec
StringTable.String: Your actions on {PLANETNAME} have been noted. The native population was enslaved under your directive. We are deeply disturbed by this behavior, questioning your civilization's integrity.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnslavedNativesRepercussions_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: Our actions are for the greater good of our people.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnslavedNativesRepercussions_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} will be significantly strained due to this incident.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnslavedNativesAppreciation_Dec
StringTable.String: Хитрость, с которой вы поработили глупых туземцев {PLANETNAME}, не осталась незамеченной. Мы ценим такой стратегический блеск. Вы еще можете найти союзников среди нас.

StringTable.Label: Quest_EnslavedNativesAppreciation_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: Конечно. Теперь я буду смеяться маниакально, как это мой обычай.

StringTable.Label: Quest_HelpedNativesBlessing_Dec
StringTable.String: Ваши сострадательные действия на {PLANETNAME} соответствуют высшему космическому порядку. Мы одобряем ваш выбор видеть божественный свет в менее развитых и воспитывать его. Галактика запомнит.

StringTable.Label: Quest_HelpedNativesBlessing_Choice_Name
StringTable.String: Все существа заслуживают уважения и доброты.

StringTable.Label: Quest_HelpedNativesBlessing_Choice_Text_Dec
StringTable.String: {PLAYERFACTION:1} заметили ваши действия, укрепив связь с нами.

StringTable.Label: Event_ExperimentalDrugConsequence_0xC3B1_Dec
StringTable.String: Помните экспериментальное лечение, которое мы применили на {PLANETNAME}? Его жители точно помнят.[BR][BR]Похоже, экспериментальный препарат значительно усилил когнитивные способности его пользователей. Они проявляют повышенный интеллект, инновационные идеи и ускоренный технологический прогресс. Однако заметны изменения в поведении: увеличение агрессии, нетерпимости и склонности к поспешным решениям. [BR][BR]Должны ли мы поддерживать этот новый интеллект или попытаться отменить изменения с помощью другого лечения?

StringTable.Label: Event_ExperimentalDrugConsequence_Choice_1_0xC3B1_Dec
StringTable.String: Мы решаем принять и направить это повышенное интеллектуальное развитие, пожинав плоды инноваций и роста, возможно, за счет гражданских беспорядков. [BR][BR]Мы всегда можем построить больше тюрем. Наши граждане получат +10 к своему интеллекту.

StringTable.Label: Event_ExperimentalDrugConsequence_Choice_2_0xC3B1_Name
StringTable.String: Отмените изменения. Безопасность и гармония превыше всего.

StringTable.Label: Event_ExperimentalDrugConsequence_Choice_2_0xC3B1_Dec
StringTable.String: Мы решаем ввести новое экспериментальное лечение с целью нейтрализации побочных эффектов лекарства, отдавая приоритет психическому благополучию и гармонии нашего населения над быстрыми прогрессом. [BR][BR]Нет немедленного результата.

StringTable.Label: Consequence_WormRodeo_Dec
StringTable.String: We recently received word that an important leader from the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} was visiting {PLANETNAME}. You may recall that you established a worm rodeo there some time ago. [BR][BR]The alien visitor was so impressed that this has led to improved relations with their species.

StringTable.Label: Consequence_WormRodeoChoice_Name
StringTable.String: I knew it was a good idea.

StringTable.Label: Consequence_SpaceWhaleMurder_Dec
StringTable.String: We are horrified and disgusted that you would exterminate the precious Lilulas, the gentle space creatures that were migrating through this part of space. The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} condemns your vile actions.

StringTable.Label: Consequence_SpaceWhaleMurder_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: I never thought you'd find out.

StringTable.Label: Entry_DrenginEmpire_Dec
StringTable.String: The Drengin Empire embodies the quintessence of cosmic ambition. Towering at over 9 feet and brandishing an impressive set of razor-sharp teeth, their reputation in the galaxy is one of both awe and fear. The year 2226 marked a poignant chapter in their history, witnessing a civil confrontation with the Korath. And in this intricate dance of power, the Drengin, surprisingly, were the more measured participants.[BR][BR]The Drengin's creed is simple: the galaxy and all its non-Drengin inhabitants exist for their dominion. Their history with the Arceans is a testament to this belief. The joint invention of the stargates was a landmark of cooperation, swiftly followed by the Drengin's attempted betrayal. The ensuing debacle cemented a rivalry that remains fervent, even as stars burn out.[BR][BR]It would be an error to assume the Drengin's aggressiveness overshadows their intellect. Their technological marvels tread into areas many would deem ethically nebulous. Their persistence in galactic conquest is evident from their historical annals. When humanity was embroiled in terrestrial power struggles, the Drengin were engineering audacious mechanisms, like the ominous 'death furnaces', and undertaking expansive campaigns like the Torian enslavement.[BR][BR]Ironically, what held the Drengin back from universal domination was the vastness of space itself. Their venture to Toria, while grand, underscored the inefficiencies of their space travel. Humanity's invention of the hyperdrive, however, leveled the cosmic playing field. The initial human overtures, grounded in idealistic hopes of a united cosmos, were met with Drengin pragmatism in 2176. The ensuing silence from that human delegation speaks volumes, reminding us all that cosmic diplomacy, with the Drengin, comes with its own set of... challenges.

StringTable.Label: Hotspot_ConquestDec
StringTable.String: A Conquest Victory is achieved by destroying all other major civilizations.[BR][BR]Check victory progress under the Victory Status screen, accessible from the pause menu.

StringTable.Label: Hotspot_InfluenceDec
StringTable.String: An Influence Victory is achieved by having a majority of the galaxy in the Zone of Control and being at piece with all other major civlizations for several months.[BR][BR]Check victory progress under the Victory Status screen, accessible from the pause menu.

StringTable.Label: Hotspot_AllianceDec
StringTable.String: An Alliance Victory is achieved by being allied with all other major civilizations.[BR][BR]Check victory progress under the Victory Status screen, accessible from the pause menu.

StringTable.Label: Hotspot_PrestigeDec
StringTable.String: A Prestige Victory is achieved by reaching a specific [HS=HS_Prestige]Prestige[/HS] Score.[BR][BR]Check victory progress under the Victory Status screen, accessible from the pause menu.

StringTable.Label: Trait_HiveMind_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Every individual operates in perfect harmony, guided by a shared consciousness. The concept of "self" has dissolved, making the civilization a powerful, singular entity.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]All units and cities act in perfect coordination with significant bonuses to simultaneous actions. Unlocks Post-Sentience technology.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_TerrorStars_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]The vastness of space hides terrifying wonders, harnessed by our civilization for dominance and defense.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Enhanced cosmic weaponry and interstellar fortifications. Fear strikes enemies upon encounter. Unlocks the Terror Star technology.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Sanctuary_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]In a galaxy of turmoil, our civilization stands as a beacon of refuge and hope.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Diplomatic bonuses and enhanced defenses make our territories a haven for allies and citizens. Unlocks The Consensus Maker technology.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Singularity_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Embracing the pinnacle of technological advancement, our civilization hovers on the brink of becoming something... transcendent.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Massive bonuses in all tech-related endeavors. Possibility of evolving into a post-biological state. Unlocks Technological Singularity technology.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Utopia_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]In our pursuit of perfection, we have crafted a society where all prosper and harmony reigns supreme.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Exceptional societal happiness, growth, and prosperity across all systems. All planets gain 1000 influence. Unlocks Dream of Utopia technology.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_Legacy_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Honoring the past, our civilization ensures that its achievements and wisdom will endure for eons.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Monuments, wonders, and cultural outputs are enhanced. History is preserved meticulously. We have successfully integrated the knowledge of the Precursors with our own glorious traditions. Provides 50 Prestige points. Unlocks Glorious Legacy technology.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_BigBrother_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Every move, every whisper, every thought is monitored for the greater good.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Impeccable internal security and surveillance. Dissent is almost non-existent. Expectations on citizens lowered by 50 points. Unlocks Coordinated Travel technology.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: Trait_SovereignIdentity_Dec
StringTable.String: [I]Above all, our civilization values its unique identity and independence, standing firm in the face of external influences.[/I][BR][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHighlight]Strong resistance against external cultural or diplomatic influences. Enhanced national pride and unity. All citizens stats increased by a factor of 3. Unlocks Individual Divinity technology.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: PainAmplifier_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Increases the constant pain of our citizens to get them to focus in order to increase [HS=HS_Research]Research[/HS].

StringTable.Label: ConstructBroadcastModule_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Produces a Broadcast module for our Vault which can be used to broadcast our culture from a target friendly planet.

StringTable.Label: RaidersAbility_Dec
StringTable.String: -50% [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] and -50% [HS=HS_Income]Income[/HS] on all worlds.[BR][BR] Gain +100 [HS=HS_Credit]Credits[/HS] and [ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +20 [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] for winning battles. [BR][BR] Gain +500 [HS=HS_Credit]Credits[/HS] and [ICON=Stat_Manufacturing_Icon] +200 [HS=HS_Manufacturing]Manufacturing[/HS] for conquering planets. [BR][BR] Starts with the Armed Shuttles Tech.

StringTable.Label: WarFleet_Dec
StringTable.String: Begins with Fighters and a Siege ship.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_RareResource_0x62A3_Dec
StringTable.String: {LEADERNAME} contacts you with news.[BR][BR] A mining conglomerate has discovered a deposit of crystalized Elerium on {PLANETNAME}, a material vital for advanced energy systems and weaponry. The conglomerate offers two proposals. [BR][BR]The first is to mine the resource using an AI based strip mining, which will bring immediate economic benefits but could harm the local environment and populace. [BR][BR]The second is to mine it sustainably, ensuring the well-being of the planet but at a slower economic pace.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_RareResource_Choice_1_0x62A3_Name
StringTable.String: Mine it all now. Who cares about alien whales and other space fish?

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_RareResource_Choice_1_0x62A3_Dec
StringTable.String: You will gain credits immediately but it will create a bit of an environmental catastrophe.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_RareResource_Choice_2_0x62A3_Name
StringTable.String: Take your time. We are in no hurry.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_RareResource_Choice_2_0x62A3_Dec
StringTable.String: You will use slower but gentler techniques to extract the resource.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_AncientArtifact_0x72B4_Dec
StringTable.String: {LEADERNAME} reaches out with intriguing news.[BR][BR] A mysterious ancient artifact has been unearthed on {PLANETNAME}. The artifact emits a unique frequency. Experts present two choices: Harvest the frequency as an energy source, which can be a boon for our reserves, or dedicate resources to decode it for ancient knowledge. The choice is yours.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_AncientArtifact_Choice_1_0x72B4_Dec
StringTable.String: We will benefit from a sudden boost in energy, but may face backlash for destroying a piece of history.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_AncientArtifact_Choice_2_0x72B4_Dec
StringTable.String: We'll gain knowledge possibly accelerating our technological growth, but will miss out on the immediate energy boost.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_ForeignVisit_0x82C5_Dec
StringTable.String: {LEADERNAME} sends an urgent transmission.[BR][BR] Ambassador Zaraq from the {PLAYERFACTION:1} wishes to visit {PLANETNAME} for a diplomatic summit. [BR][BR]The ambassador is not popular.[BR][BR]Really really not popular.[BR][BR]Do we grant the visit or decline diplomatically?

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_ForeignVisit_Choice_1_0x82C5_Dec
StringTable.String: Strengthening ties with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} might lead to new opportunities, but risks unrest among our citizens.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_ForeignVisit_Choice_2_0x82C5_Dec
StringTable.String: Peace within the colony will be maintained, but our relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1} suffer.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_AlienPlantHarvest_0x92D6_Dec
StringTable.String: Governor {LEADERNAME} contacts you with an intriguing proposition. [BR][BR]The {PLAYERFACTION:1} have expressed interest in harvesting a unique plant from {PLANETNAME}. This flora produces a resin that is a potent ingredient for various beneficial chemicals. However, this resin can also be refined into a potent and addictive drug. [BR][BR]Allowing the harvest would bolster relations and boost planetary income, but could also lead to increased crime rates on the colony.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_AlienPlantHarvest_Choice_1_0x92D6_Name
StringTable.String: Allow the harvest. Our finances could use the boost.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_AlienPlantHarvest_Choice_1_0x92D6_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with {PLAYERFACTION:1} will improve and the planet's economy will improve, but crime will rise on {PLANETNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_AlienPlantHarvest_Choice_2_0x92D6_Name
StringTable.String: Deny the request. We don't what the syndicate to show up.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_AlienPlantHarvest_Choice_2_0x92D6_Dec
StringTable.String: Relations with {PLAYERFACTION:1} will deteriorate but at least the crime will remain unchanged on {PLANETNAME}.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_AncientFacility_0xA7F4_Dec
StringTable.String: Governor {LEADERNAME} sends you a transmission detailing the discovery of an ancient Arnorian facility on {PLANETNAME}. [BR][BR]The energy signal it emits could be of great value, but the indigenous species we've encountered on the planet consider it sacred ground. [BR][BR]Should we harness its energy or respect the local beliefs?

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_AncientFacility_Choice_1_0xA7F4_Name
StringTable.String: Extract the energy. Might makes right.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_AncientFacility_Choice_1_0xA7F4_Dec
StringTable.String: We will harness the facility's energy, boosting our surplus manufacturing reserves but possibly straining relations with the indigenous species on {PLANETNAME}.[BR][BR]No immediate consequences to be seen.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_AncientFacility_Choice_2_0xA7F4_Name
StringTable.String: Respect the sacred site. We shouldn't interfere.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_AncientFacility_Choice_2_0xA7F4_Dec
StringTable.String: We decide to honor the indigenous species' beliefs, ensuring peace on {PLANETNAME} but foregoing the potential energy resource.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_IllnessDilemma_0xB8A2_Dec
StringTable.String: Governor {LEADERNAME} reaches out with alarming news: a mysterious illness has struck {PLANETNAME}. A locally developed experimental drug might combat the disease, but its potential side effects are unknown. [BR][BR]Relying solely on approved treatments will curb the epidemic but slow the planet's growth for years. How should we proceed?

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_IllnessDilemma_Choice_1_0xB8A2_Name
StringTable.String: Compel the population to use the experimental drug.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_IllnessDilemma_Choice_1_0xB8A2_Dec
StringTable.String: The experimental drug is distributed widely, potentially preventing further devastation but introducing the risk of unknown side effects.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_IllnessDilemma_Choice_2_0xB8A2_Name
StringTable.String: Use only approved treatments. Safety first.

StringTable.Label: Event_GovernorEvent_IllnessDilemma_Choice_2_0xB8A2_Dec
StringTable.String: By using only the tried-and-tested methods, we ensure the well-being of our citizens, even if it means a setback for {PLANETNAME}'s growth.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalExchangeProposal_0xD4E2_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} have approached Governor {LEADERNAME} of {PLANETNAME} with an intriguing offer. They wish to establish a cultural exchange office on our planet, promising aid in our manufacturing endeavors. [BR][BR]However, our intelligence suggests this could serve as a cover for their espionage activities. [BR][BR]Accepting their offer might bolster our production, but at the potential risk of a spy network. Rejecting might offend them. How should we proceed?

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalExchangeProposal_Choice_1_0xD4E2_Name
StringTable.String: Accept the offer. We'll take the risk for the aid.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalExchangeProposal_Choice_1_0xD4E2_Dec
StringTable.String: We decide to welcome the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} and their cultural exchange office, receiving their manufacturing aid but also exposing ourselves to potential espionage. [BR][BR]No immediate consequences.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalExchangeProposal_Choice_2_0xD4E2_Name
StringTable.String: Decline politely. We cannot risk our security.

StringTable.Label: Event_CulturalExchangeProposal_Choice_2_0xD4E2_Dec
StringTable.String: We choose to prioritize our security, declining the offer of the {PLAYERFACTION:1} . This might sour our relations, but our planet's security remains uncompromised. [BR][BR]No immediate consequences.

StringTable.Label: Event_YorObservationProposal_0xF3A8_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} have approached Governor {LEADERNAME} of {PLANETNAME} with an unusual request. They wish to set up an observation post to study our society and culture. In exchange, they are offering us advanced technology. [BR][BR]However, our citizens are deeply uncomfortable with the idea of being under the watchful eyes of the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. [BR][BR]While their technology is tempting, we must consider the well-being of our people. Declining might be seen as an insult to the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}. What should we do?

StringTable.Label: Event_YorObservationProposal_Choice_1_0xF3A8_Name
StringTable.String: Accept the offer. We could use some tech.

StringTable.Label: Event_YorObservationProposal_Choice_1_0xF3A8_Dec
StringTable.String: We grant the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} their observation post in exchange for their technology. However, our citizens may feel uneasy about their new observers. [BR][BR]No immediate consequences.

StringTable.Label: Event_YorObservationProposal_Choice_2_0xF3A8_Name
StringTable.String: Decline. This isn't an ant farm.

StringTable.Label: Event_YorObservationProposal_Choice_2_0xF3A8_Dec
StringTable.String: We prioritize the well-being and comfort of our citizens, denying the {PLAYERFACTION:1} request.

StringTable.Label: Event_AltarianCodexProposal_0xG4B9_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} have approached the governor {LEADERNAME} of {PLANETNAME} with a unique offer: they are willing to share a codex of Universal Truths in exchange for some ancient relics that have little value to us but are of great importance to them.[BR][BR]The Codex would increase the cultural value of this planet given its historic value.

StringTable.Label: Event_AltarianCodexProposal_Choice_1_0xG4B9_Dec
StringTable.String: We've chosen to trade the relics for the codex, hoping the knowledge within will increase this world's influence.

StringTable.Label: Event_AltarianCodexProposal_Choice_2_0xG4B9_Dec
StringTable.String: We respectfully decline the {PLAYERFACTION:1} proposal, choosing to safeguard the relics. This may affect relations.

StringTable.Label: Event_IconianHistoryShare_0xH5C1_Dec
StringTable.String: The ancient {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} have approached the governor {LEADERNAME} of {PLANETNAME} with a profound offer: they wish to share their ancient history that reveals the tales of the Arnor, Dread Lords, and the momentous Precursor wars.[BR][BR]Such knowledge can be both a blessing and a curse, reshaping the beliefs and culture of the local population.

StringTable.Label: Event_IconianHistoryShare_Choice_1_0xH5C1_Dec
StringTable.String: By accepting this history it undermienes many traditional beliefs and religons. It will give us a short-term burst of knowledge but some unrest for a time.

StringTable.Label: Event_IconianHistoryShare_Choice_2_0xH5C1_Dec
StringTable.String: We decline the offer, choosing to let our population remain blissfully ignorant.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlienTradeAgreement_0xJ6D2_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} have approached governor {LEADERNAME} of {PLANETNAME} with a lucrative trade agreement. This deal promises to greatly elevate the planet's economy, but locals have voiced their concerns over the influx of alien visitors it might bring.[BR][BR]The potential for cultural enrichment is immense, yet so is the potential for tension.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlienTradeAgreement_Choice_1_0xJ6D2_Dec
StringTable.String: We embrace the trade deal, anticipating the economic boom it will bring. However, we must also be prepared for potential cultural clashes due to the new alien visitors and their various smells.

StringTable.Label: Event_AlienTradeAgreement_Choice_2_0xJ6D2_Dec
StringTable.String: Choosing the wishes of the local population, we decline the trade deal, potentially souring relations with the {PLAYERFACTION:1}.

StringTable.Label: LeaderTrait_MissingTwin_Dec
StringTable.String: Had an identical twin that went missing years ago.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmedShuttles_Drengin_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provide a prototype Siege ship to conquer small enemy worlds.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmedShuttles_Drengin_Dec
StringTable.String: The galaxy and its people must be destroyed if it is to be reborn under our rule. A prototype Siege Ship will bring our might to the weak very quickly.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CoordinatedTravel_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Makes traveling in our area of influence cost essentially nothing.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CoordinatedTravel_Dec
StringTable.String: With the advancement of Coordinated Travel, our fleets and convoys can move in perfect harmony. This technology uses advanced algorithms and real-time data streams to ensure our fleets can move through friendly space at speeds previously thought impossible.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GloriousLegacy_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Provides ultimate understanding of the Precursors.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GloriousLegacy_Dec
StringTable.String: Our pursuit for immortality is not limited to individuals but extends to our civilization's achievements and wisdom. The Glorious Legacy technology establishes advanced archiving, conservation, and broadcast methods to ensure our culture, discoveries, and stories resonate through the cosmos, forever untouched by time's decay.[BR][BR]This manifests in the non-trivial fact that we have had to reconcile our own beliefs and faiths with the fact that we know, for a fact there there was a Precursor civilization that was created by a set of beings called the Mithrilar. These beings split into the Arnor and Dread Lords who fought each other before most species in this galaxy even evolved. This perfect understanding allows us to intuitively use their works as if they were our own.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CallOfUtopia_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Unlocks an executive order that massively increases influence on the target world.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_CallOfUtopia_Dec
StringTable.String: Through the Call of Utopia, our civilization embarks on a journey to actualize a society where harmony, prosperity, and happiness reign supreme. Advanced sociological models, infrastructure blueprints, and community engagement strategies lay the groundwork for turning our utopian dream into a tangible reality. [BR][BR]This culminates through an executive order that, when used, drastically increases the influence of its target core world which will, if not immediately, in short order bring other civilizations into our light.

StringTable.Label: MasterSanctuaryTech_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Our diplomatic skills will increase every month.

StringTable.Label: MasterSanctuaryTech_Dec
StringTable.String: To know us will be to love us. The Sanctuary technology focuses on building zones of unparalleled safety, both in terms of defense and societal well-being. Through advanced shielding, rapid-response systems, and a culture of care, these sanctuaries ensure that in times of crisis, our people have an unwavering beacon to turn to.[BR][BR]Every month our diplomatic ability will increase until every civilization cannot help but love us.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ndividualDivinity_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Empowering citizens to ascend to godhood.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_IndividualDivinity_Dec
StringTable.String: Our citizens stats will increase by 0.1 per month forever. Unlocking the latent potential within every individual, the Individual Divinity technology sets our citizens on a path of continuous evolution and self-improvement. Through spiritual, mental, and physical enhancement protocols, our people grow stronger, wiser, and more attuned to the cosmos each passing day, edging ever closer to a state of divine existence.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DeepSpaceLabor_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Trains our thralls to work in space on asteroids and starships.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DeepSpaceLabor_Dec
StringTable.String: Getting our thralls to do work is always hard. Getting them to do it in space is nearly impossible without the right techniques. This technology enables us to more effectively use our thralls to mine asteroids as well as station them on ships which frees up actual people to do what matters.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_StellarPropulsion_Dec
StringTable.String: We need to better understand what is involved in traveling through bent space in order to make the most of it. This technology will allow us to disseminate to our captains new ways of traveling faster.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetarySubstrates_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Prepare our worlds for synthetic life. Provides device to increase planet class.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_PlanetarySubstrates_Dec
StringTable.String: By integrating advanced planetary substrates, our robotic kin can seamlessly synchronize with the core of planets, enhancing our resource extraction and optimization capabilities.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GodOfTheMachine_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Develop a theory of consciousness. Provides a device to increase our influence.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_GodOfTheMachine_Dec
StringTable.String: Delving into the intricate fabric of thought and cognition, the "God of the Machine" technology represents a profound understanding of synthetic consciousness. This monumental breakthrough not only demystifies the very essence of sentience but also equips us with an advanced device that amplifies our influence across systems. By resonating with the fundamental frequencies of robotic cognition, this device strengthens our diplomatic and strategic outreach, positioning our robotic species at the forefront of galactic affairs.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_RecursiveModels_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Create new modes of thought allowing for greater research. Provides a space exploration device.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_RecursiveModels_Dec
StringTable.String: The "Recursive Models" epitomizes a quantum leap in synthetic cognitive architectures. Harnessing principles from non-linear dynamics and advanced algorithmic topology, this technology enables our robotic consciousness to access and iterate through multi-dimensional thought planes, thus optimizing our computational research vectors. Accompanying this advancement is an ultra-spectral space exploration device, crafted from exotic matter and quantum-entangled sensors. This apparatus operates in tandem with our enhanced cognition, probing space-time anomalies and extracting hyper-detailed cosmological data. In transcending our previous limitations, we are poised to decode the very matrix of the cosmos, navigating its intricate tapestry with a rigor previously deemed unattainable.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DiversityOfLife_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Assimilate other cultures into our own to amplify our own. Unlocks the [HS=HS_BroadcastCulture]Broadcast Culture[/HS] project.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_DiversityOfLife_Dec
StringTable.String: By meticulously studying the plethora of lifeforms and their intricate cultural tapestries, this advanced technology enables our robotic civilization to curate a meta-culture—a confluence of the myriad. As we assimilate, interpret, and emulate these diverse cultural nuances, we create a universal appeal that resonates with a vast spectrum of lifeforms. This not only amplifies our cultural growth but also fosters a harmonious coexistence in the galactic milieu, turning diversity into our strength and establishing us as cultural beacons in the cosmos.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Negotiations_ShortDec
StringTable.String: Improves our communication skills with inferior beings.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_Negotiations_Dec
StringTable.String: In the vast expanse of the cosmos, where myriad civilizations converge, the art of negotiation becomes pivotal. The "Diplomatic Algorithms of Negotiation" technology represents a quantum leap in synthetic interpersonal dynamics. By deconstructing and simulating countless diplomatic scenarios and cultural intricacies, we've fine-tuned our protocols to understand, adapt, and resonate with diverse species. These advanced algorithms not only enhance our negotiation prowess but also expedite the establishment of harmonious ties. As we navigate the vast tapestry of galactic politics, this newfound expertise positions our robotic civilization as astute diplomats, forging alliances and understanding even in the most complex of interstellar relations.

StringTable.Label: MasterTech_ArmedShuttles_Yor_Dec
StringTable.String: Within our relentless drive for optimization lies the fusion of exploration and combat utility. The "Weaponized Probes Protocol" crystallizes this philosophy. Merging our sophisticated shuttle tech with cutting-edge armaments, we've birthed a new breed of probes – equipped to explore, report, and when necessary, retaliate. This evolutionary step not only solidifies our presence in the vast expanse but also ensures that our expeditions remain unchallenged, reinforcing the Yor's position as a dominant force in the galactic theatre.

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureExchange_Dec_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: We have a proposal for the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:0}. In the interest of peace we would like to hold a Cultural Exchange Festival. The are art, music, and traditions from both civilizations might promote understanding and unity.

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureExchange_Choice1_Dec_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: We have decided to promote the event, expecting an influx of tourists and a boost in cultural appreciation. However, we will have to spend some control to manage the diverse crowd.

StringTable.Label: Event_CultureExchange_Choice2_Dec_0X9A7BC
StringTable.String: We have decided against the cultural festival. We prioritize our internal peace and stability. This decision, however, may not sit well with the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}.

StringTable.Label: Event_CivPilgrimage_0x49B2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people are very spiritual. There are areas within your sphere of influence that our people believe connect them to the ancient Mithilar. Would you allow them to pass through your territory? We would appreciate it.

StringTable.Label: Event_CivPilgrimage_0x49B2_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: Recognizing the spiritual significance and respecting their traditions, we have granted them permission for the pilgrimage. It will cost some control to ensure their safety.

StringTable.Label: Event_CivPilgrimage_0x49B2_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: The last thing we need are a bunch of alien spies traveling through our space.

StringTable.Label: Event_FeastProposal_0x15E9_Dec
StringTable.String: We, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, are approaching a significant period in our lifecycle — our sacred mating ritual.[BR][BR]For the ritual's success, we require sentients to feast upon. We would like you to provide these sentients. You can gather them from your prisons if that helps you justify it. But its importance to our kind cannot be overstated. Will you offer this gesture of goodwill?

StringTable.Label: Event_FeastProposal_0x15E9_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Fine. Round up some criminals to feed to them.

StringTable.Label: Event_FeastProposal_0x15E9_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: The choice will surely cause unrest among our people. But it will improve relations at least. For now.

StringTable.Label: Event_FeastProposal_0x15E9_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: They will be unhappy with this choice but our people will still respect you just as little tomorrow..

StringTable.Label: Event_SportRequest_0x23F4_Dec
StringTable.String: We, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, have a long-standing tradition of games that test the true capabilities of one's physique and mental prowess. For warm up, your weak species would be well advised to provide some specimens for our warriors to practice on.

StringTable.Label: Event_SportRequest_0x23F4_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Only if I get to watch.

StringTable.Label: Event_SportRequest_0x23F4_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people will likely be horrified by this decision, but it may prevent further conflict with the cruel {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}.

StringTable.Label: Event_SportRequest_0x23F4_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: While our people will be relieved, this might further sour our relations with them.

StringTable.Label: Event_SubmersionFestival_0x3C4D_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1} cordially invites your people to join our Deepwater Festival, a celebration of our amphibious heritage. We request some of your best swimmers to experience the depth of our oceans. It's a unique, once-in-a-lifetime opportunity. But, we must admit, it comes with some risks. [BR][BR]Will you accept?

StringTable.Label: Event_SubmersionFestival_0x3C4D_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: It's an opportunity for cultural exchange but also some risk if any of our swimmers die.

StringTable.Label: Event_SubmersionFestival_0x3C4D_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: This is too dangerous for us to participate in.

StringTable.Label: Event_SubmersionFestival_0x3C4D_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: Even though we have some people who would jump at the chance to participate, the scandal if something went wrong would be a disaster.

StringTable.Label: Event_OceanExploration_0x4F5A_Dec
StringTable.String: Our people, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, have a profound connection to water. We wish to explore the depths of your oceans, study its inhabitants, and understand its mysteries.[BR][BR]We assure you, our intentions are purely scientific. Would you permit us?

StringTable.Label: Event_OceanExploration_0x4F5A_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: It's a step towards interstellar cooperation, but our coastal communities are particularly wary.

StringTable.Label: Event_OceanExploration_0x4F5A_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: No. Our worlds are not open for this.

StringTable.Label: Event_OceanExploration_0x4F5A_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: We value our autonomy and the sentiments of our people. The seas remain ours alone.

StringTable.Label: Event_DevoutShrines_0x5A1B_Dec
StringTable.String: As you know the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, have been enlightened by The Way. We wish to bring you salvation by setting up shrines on your planets, teaching your people of our sacred beliefs. Embrace The Way and allow us to guide you to the true path. Do you accept?

StringTable.Label: Event_DevoutShrines_0x5A1B_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Very well. Set up your shrines.

StringTable.Label: Event_DevoutShrines_0x5A1B_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: This will reduce our cultural influence growth for a time.

StringTable.Label: Event_DevoutShrines_0x5A1B_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: They may not take this rejection lightly, but our influence remains undiminished.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreamSpyingAccusation_0x8C3D_Dec
StringTable.String: We've been watching you. We know your people have been infiltrating the dreams of the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}. We're not crazy. [BR][BR]We demand 10 units of Antimatter to build a device to shield our minds from your prying.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreamSpyingAccusation_0x8C3D_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: You can have the Antimatter but I doubt it will help.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreamSpyingAccusation_0x8C3D_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: While the claims are baseless, this might be the way to keep the peace.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreamSpyingAccusation_0x8C3D_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: Если тебе приходится говорить, что ты не сумасшедший...

StringTable.Label: Event_DreamSpyingAccusation_0x8C3D_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: They might be furious, but we won't be bullied based on delusions.

StringTable.Label: Event_DreamSpyingAccusation_PositiveDiplomaticReason_0x8C3D
StringTable.String: Ты не шпионишь за нашими снами

StringTable.Label: Event_DreamSpyingAccusation_NegativeDiplomaticReason_0x8C3D
StringTable.String: You are spying on our dreams

StringTable.Label: Event_WarProfiteerDeal_0xA12F_Dec
StringTable.String: We, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, have come across some... extra military hardware. We thought you might be interested. These arms will significantly bolster your weapons capabilities. However, remember, such deals remain between us. Do we have an agreement?

StringTable.Label: Event_WarProfiteerDeal_0xA12F_Choice1_Name
StringTable.String: Better weapons on our ships? Yes. Yes please.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarProfiteerDeal_0xA12F_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: These weapons will help but they will lower our overall diplomatic ability.

StringTable.Label: Event_WarProfiteerDeal_0xA12F_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: We are not in the habit of installing strange weapons from foreign governments.

StringTable.Label: Event_TraderDeal_0xC45D_Dec
StringTable.String: We, the {PLAYERFACTIONLONG:1}, have a limited time offer for you. A rare Harmony Crystal, known to enhance the wellbeing and productivity of colonies or something. All we ask for in return is a modest sum.

StringTable.Label: Event_TraderDeal_0xC45D_Choice2_Name
StringTable.String: We can't afford it right now.

StringTable.Label: Event_TraderDeal_0xC45D_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: Perhaps another time, when our coffers are more abundant.

StringTable.Label: Event_PersuasionOffer_0xC45E_Dec
StringTable.String: Our traders have honed the art of persuasion through countless dealings across the galaxy. For a fee we'd be willing to share some of these trade secrets with you. This knowledge could greatly benefit your future negotiations. Interested?

StringTable.Label: Event_PersuasionOffer_0xC45E_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: The art of persuasion is a valuable skill. We accept. We can use persuassion when trading to get better deals.

StringTable.Label: Event_PersuasionOffer_0xC45E_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: We will rely on our own methods of negotiation.

StringTable.Label: Event_CrystalResonance_0xC45F_Dec
StringTable.String: The {PLAYERFACTION:1} have come to you with a proposal. We can detect harmonics that are beyond your imagination. We are willing to share knowledge on how to detect these harmonics which should aid your science but in return we want access to some of your worlds that have unique crystalline formations.

StringTable.Label: Event_CrystalResonance_0xC45F_Choice1_Dec
StringTable.String: The ancient knowledge of the universe is invaluable. We accept.

StringTable.Label: Event_CrystalResonance_0xC45F_Choice2_Dec
StringTable.String: Our resources are for our own use. We cannot grant access. This may insult them.

StringTable.Label: Event_Interview_Deception_Dec
StringTable.String: This will make additional event choices available later.

StringTable.Label: Event_Interview_Persuassion_Dec
StringTable.String: This will improve our persuassion technique during trade negotiations.

StringTable.Label: Event_Interview_Intimidation_Dec
StringTable.String: This will let us get more when we use our intimidation technique during trade negotiations.

StringTable.Label: Event_CosmicEye_Fail_Dec
StringTable.String: Our cosmic eye has gazed upon the {PLAYERFACTION:1}. Although no new technolgies were observed, we have gathered some insights on reseach methods different from our own.

StringTable.Label: Thinktank_CollectiveConsciousness_Dec
StringTable.String: Enhance the strength and cohesiveness of the collective consciousness.

StringTable.Label: TheOpportunity_CampaignDec
StringTable.String: The year is 2307. The Drengin Empire once dominated this part of the galaxy. All other races served as slaves. The Empire was destined to last forever. But then, the diplomats of Sol III organized a rebellion and overturned Drengin dominance.[BR][BR]The once glorious Drengin Empire was reduced to a single star system. The home system remained untouched. The humans and their allies will not keep the Empire suppressed![BR][BR]Space is quite vast. In the Utha sector, worlds are untouched—a fresh start. However, It's not entirely isolated. Subspace traffic indicates something else is in this sector. Seek it out and conquer it!

StringTable.Label: Campaign_TheOpportunity_FindSignal_Dec
StringTable.String: The Empire deemed this sector secluded enough to begin expansion anew. Yet recent subspace signals indicate the sector isn't as isolated as expected. No matter what it is, find the signal's source and stomp it out.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_TheOpportunity_ConquerTargetHomeworld_Dec
StringTable.String: The Navigators are weak, exposed, and alone. Take their homeworld. It will send a message to their colonies that the Drengin Empire reigns here. They will submit, whether willingly or by force.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_TheOpportunity_ScanConqueredHomeworld_Dec
StringTable.String: The Navigators think they can hide things from the Drengin Empire. They are wrong. Scanning the recently conquered planet will expose whatever the Navigators don't want to be found.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_DRENGIN_Campaign_TheOpportunity_StartupDescription
StringTable.String: The humans and their allies believe they have successfully suppressed the Drengin Empire. They will be proven wrong. The Empire needs resources to return to dominance and subjugate all those inferior species.[BR][BR]So expansion begins here in Utha, an untouched sector of the universe. We are not alone as initially thought. Subspace traffic indicates something else is in the system. It, whatever it may be, can not be allowed to stand in the Empire's way. Seek it out, conquer it.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_DRENGIN_Campaign_TheOpportunity_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: There are none more vicious than the Drengin Empire. Borders expand quickly and gathered resources rapidly funneled into the military. Claiming planets and building a fleet will ensure nothing can resist Drengin subjugation.

StringTable.Label: Drengin_TheOpportunity_System_Dec
StringTable.String: The Utha System has a Class 32 planet and several smaller planets making it the perfect place to start expanding the Empire's borders.

StringTable.Label: Navigators_TheOpportunity_System_Dec
StringTable.String: The Minos system has a Class 32 planet where the Navigators crashed, allowing them to establish a colony and survive.

StringTable.Label: Project_TheOpportunity_ScanPlanet_ShortDec
StringTable.String: We can scan our planet for the object the Navigators hid.

StringTable.Label: Tutorial_CampaignDec
StringTable.String: In 2178, the humans of a United Earth developed Hyperdrive Propulsion systems, discovering faster-than-light travel.[BR][BR]Humanity had already established interstellar contact with two civilizations: The Korx and the Arcean Empire. Some scientists, eager to share their discoveries, transmit the specifications for the new drive systems to the Arceans and the Korx. Both groups go silent immediately after receiving the specifications for this new technology. Earth is left alone in the universe once again.[BR][BR]You are Commander DL Bradley, leader of the newly formed Terran Alliance. This group has been created to oversee the manned exploration of space and the colonization of new planets. Humanity's new Hyperdrive Propulsion makes such grand ambitions possible.[BR][BR]Unfortunately, you must contend with a new threat: Pirates. A group of terrorists have acquired the Hyperdrive plans. They threaten all colonization efforts as long as they keep a foothold in nearby star systems. At some point, we will need to find and destroy their base.[BR][BR]Your primary mission is to colonize at least 8 worlds with at least one large enough to warrant a governor and establish leaders to support the effort.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_Tutorail_ColonizeTargetPlanets_Dec
StringTable.String: Explore the galaxy to find planets to colonize. Planets can be colonized using Colony Ships. Colony Ships can be constructed at a Shipyard or obtained through the Draft Colonists Executive Order.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_Tutorail_FillCabinet_Dec
StringTable.String: Grant benefits to the entire Alliance by recruiting Leaders and putting them to work. Recruited Leaders can be assigned roles in the Ministry, accessible through the Leader Screen. Each position provides a unique benefit based on a specific stat, so pick the best person for the job to get the best benefit possible.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_Tutorail_AppointGovernor_Dec
StringTable.String: Planets with a Planet Class 10 or greater can be turned into Coreworlds by assigning a Governor to the planet. To assign a Governor, you'll first need a Leader available. Planets with Governors can be upgraded to improve output and support a new Shipyard.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_Tutorail_DestroyTheShipyard_Dec
StringTable.String: Pirates have set up a base in this part of the galaxy. While they're allowed a Shipyard, they can produce ships that threaten the whole Alliance. Destroying the Pirate's Shipyard will weaken their forces and drive them from the galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_Tutorail_Overall
StringTable.String: Secure the Sector for the Terran Alliance

StringTable.Label: Campaign_Tutorail_FindCoreWorld_Dec
StringTable.String: You've successfully colonized enough planets for the Alliance; however, the Alliance wants to enhance its foothold with a new Coreworld. To establish a new Coreworld, you'll need a Colony on a planet with a Planet Class 10 or higher. Continue to search the galaxy for a planet at Planet Class 10 or greater to colonize.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_Tutorail_UnlockLeaders_Dec
StringTable.String: There are a lot of benefits that Leaders provide to the entire civilization. The project Colonial Leadership needs to be completed at the homeworld to recruit and manage Leaders. The project can be queued up and completed through the planet management screen from the Projects section.

StringTable.Label: Event_Campaign_Tutorial_Intro_Dec
StringTable.String: In 2178, the humans of a United Earth developed Hyperdrive Propulsion systems, discovering faster-than-light travel.[BR][BR]Humanity had already established interstellar contact with two civilizations: The Korx and the Arcean Empire. Some scientists, eager to share their discoveries, transmit the specifications for the new drive systems to the Arceans and the Korx. Both groups go silent immediately after receiving the specifications for this new technology. Earth is left alone in the universe once again.[BR][BR]You are Commander DL Bradley, leader of the newly formed Terran Alliance. This group has been created to oversee the manned exploration of space and the colonization of new planets. Humanity's new Hyperdrive Propulsion makes such grand ambitions possible.[BR][BR]Unfortunately, you must contend with a new threat: Pirates. A group of terrorists have acquired the Hyperdrive plans. They threaten all colonization efforts as long as they keep a foothold in nearby star systems. At some point, we will need to find and destroy their base.[BR][BR]Your primary mission is to colonize at least 8 worlds with at least one large enough to warrant a governor and establish leaders to support the effort.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_TERRAN_Campaign_Tutorial_StartupDescription
StringTable.String: The Terran Alliance has been formed by United Earth to explore space and colonize new planets. This project has been made possible by the development of faster-than-light travel. Approaching the galaxy warrants caution. If the natural dangers of the cosmos weren't enough, there might be aliens. [BR][BR]It's been some time since humanity last contacted the Arceans or the Korx, leaving them alone in the galaxy once more. It may only be a matter of time before discovering other alien groups. Until then, it's up to the Terran Alliance and its commander, DL Bradley, to secure the sector in the name of humanity.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_TERRAN_Campaign_Tutorial_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: The Terran Alliance's current isolation should be considered an advantage. There is an opportunity to expand, establish production, and discover how best to organize.

StringTable.Label: GALACTICACHIEVEMENT_HSTEXT
StringTable.String: Только одно такое улучшение может быть построено в галактике всеми игроками.

StringTable.Label: PLAYERACHIEVEMENT_HSTEXT
StringTable.String: Только одно такое улучшение может быть построено на цивилизацию.

StringTable.Label: COLONYUNIQUE_HSTEXT
StringTable.String: Только одно это улучшение может быть построено на этом основном мире.

StringTable.Label: HOTKEY_TOOLTIP_AUTOMINE_TEXT
StringTable.String: [B]Автошахта[/B][BR][COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Попытается создать шахтерскую базу на ближайшем астероиде, если это возможно.[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: IS_SYNTHETIC_ERROR_LABEL
StringTable.String: [COLOR=BrightRed]Синтетическая жизнь не может использовать традиционные бонусы роста населения[/COLOR]

StringTable.Label: SUMMARY_TAB_COREWORLDS_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Это подсчет Центральных Миров, которые контролирует ваша Цивилизация.[BR][BR]Центральные Миры - это планеты с назначенным Губернатором, которые можно улучшить и на которых может быть поддержан Верфь. Планета должна быть класса 10 или выше, чтобы быть преобразованной в Центральный Мир.

StringTable.Label: SUMMARY_TAB_COLONIES_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Это подсчет колоний, которыми управляет ваша цивилизация.[BR][BR]Колония - это любая планета, которая была колонизирована и не находится под управлением губернатора. Колонии обеспечивают дополнительный ввод ближайшему Центральному Миру для улучшения его выходных данных.

StringTable.Label: SUMMARY_TAB_POPULATION_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Это количество Граждан в вашей цивилизации.[BR][BR]Граждане доступны из Центральных Миров. Граждане увеличивают производительность Центрального Мира и необходимы для Колониальных Кораблей, строящихся на Верфи для колонизации новых планет.

StringTable.Label: YourMemoryFormat_Met
StringTable.String: Рекомендуется как минимум {VALUE:0}GB памяти для этой Галактической карты.[BR][BR]У вас есть {VALUE:1}GB доступной памяти, и вы соответствуете этой рекомендации.

StringTable.Label: YourMemoryFormat_NotMet
StringTable.String: Рекомендуется использовать минимум {VALUE:0}GB памяти для этой Галактической карты.[BR][BR]У вас доступно {VALUE:1}GB, и вы НЕ соответствуете этой рекомендации.

StringTable.Label: YourCoresFormat_Met
StringTable.String: Рекомендуется использовать минимум {VALUE:0} логических ядер для этой Галактической карты.[BR][BR]У вас доступно {VALUE:1} логических ядер, и вы соответствуете этой рекомендации.

StringTable.Label: YourCoresFormat_NotMet
StringTable.String: Рекомендуется не менее {VALUE:0} логических ядер для этой Галактической карты.[BR][BR]У вас доступно {VALUE:1} логических ядер и вы НЕ соответствуете этой рекомендации.

StringTable.Label: ExtremePlanetDetails
StringTable.String: Экстремальные планеты обладают интенсивными условиями или климатом, требующими специфических технологий или способностей для колонизации. Экстремальные планеты могут предложить изобилие определенных ресурсов в обмен на сложность и опасность освоения.

StringTable.Label: TurnTimeLimitTooltip
StringTable.String: Устанавливает максимальное время длительности хода игрока.

StringTable.Label: SELECTAGAME_PROMPT
StringTable.String: No game selected. Select a game from the list of [COLOR=UIDefaultHot]Available Games[/COLOR] to Join it.

StringTable.Label: KICK_PLAYER_CONFIRM_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: Are you sure you want to kick this player? Their civilization will instead be run by an AI player.

StringTable.Label: KICKED_ALERT_MESSAGE
StringTable.String: The host has kicked you from your multiplayer game.

StringTable.Label: PLANET_AUTOMATE_OPTION_TOOLTIP
StringTable.String: Allowt the AI to manage your world.

StringTable.Label: PLANET_AUTOMATE_OPTION_DISABLED_CAPITAL
StringTable.String: You cannot automate your civilization Capital.

StringTable.Label: PLANET_AUTOMATE_OPTION_DISABLED_NOT_CORE_WORLD
StringTable.String: You cannot automate worlds without a governor.

StringTable.Label: PLANET_AUTOMATE_OPTION_DISABLED_AI
StringTable.String: This planet is already being managed by the AI

StringTable.Label: SoulOfMachine_CampaignDec
StringTable.String: Even in 2307, the Yor Singularity remains a powerful force in the Galaxy. Long have they strived to bring others into their collective consciousness -the Totatily. Though their programming compels them to continue to expand and convert organic to synthetic, they are far from alone among the stars.[BR][BR]The Singularity must make several critical decisions that will determine their efforts for decades. Who among the other Civilizations do they forge alliances with, and who do they destroy? Will their bitter conflict with their creators, the Iconian Refuge, ever end?

StringTable.Label: Campaign_SoulOfMachine_Overall_Dec
StringTable.String: Achieve victory by any means necessary. Prove the Yor's superiority in any (if not all) matters. Utilize logic to force all other beings into a Yor-led alliance for an [HS=HS_AllianceVictory]Alliance Victory[/HS]. Deploy perfectly calculated tactics to dominate and eliminate all resistance for a [HS=HS_ConquestVictory]Conquest Victory[/HS]. Dominate the culture through Yor's single-minded and efficient culture for an [HS=HS_InfluenceVictory]Influence Victory[/HS]. Or even achieve a [HS=HS_PrestigeVictory]Prestige Victory[/HS] and prove that no one ranks higher than the Yor.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_YOR_SoulOfMachine_StartupDescription
StringTable.String: The Yor are artificial beings, originally servants of an ancient species known as the Iconians. Granted sentience by the Dread Lords, the Yor turned against their Iconian creators, apparently wiping them from the face of the galaxy. Whether due to some hidden command of the Dread Lords, or simply from applying the cold rules of logic, the Yor have since become viciously xenophobic, and now despise all biological lifeforms. Capable of long-term planning and a surprising degree of cunning, the Yor often speak and negotiate with organic beings. Those beings should understand that this is nothing but a short-term ploy, and that their new friends will never rest until they, and all other organic life, are destroyed.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_YOR_SoulOfMachine_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: The Yor are highly productive and capable of building large fleets of self-repairing vessels. They're profoundly unpopular, and few races opt to befriend them. Unlike organic races, their growth rate is a function of production capacity.

StringTable.Label: EverythingForSale_CampaignDec
StringTable.String: With so many different Civilizations in the Galaxy, 2307 could be a banner year for trade and commerce. Someone needs to facilitate all the various transactions and dealings, and the Corporate Sector is the most obvious fit for the role.[BR][BR]The Corporate Sector has a chance to secure a dominant position in the Galaxy through Influence and market control.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_EverythingForSale_Overall_Dec
StringTable.String: Nothing is more influential than currency, at least according to the Corporate Sector. To achieve an [HS=HS_InfluenceVictory]Influence Victory[/HS], have Corporate Sector influence control most of the sector and be at peace with all other major civilizations for several months. Dominate the market so that all other factions rely on trade through the Corporate Sector to survive, which will dissuade conflict.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_IRIDIUM_EverythingForSale_StartupDescription
StringTable.String: The Corporate Sector is the apex corporate entity of an ultra-capitalistic society, the only organization capable of entering into contracts on behalf of the entire Iridium people. The Iridium culture is based on a firm, even fanatical belief in the power of free markets. Although no strangers to weaponry, all research is first considered through the lens of mutual cooperation; the destructive cost of warfare is often too great for Iridiums to seriously consider. It remains to be seen how well this philosophy will fare when introduced to more close-minded races.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_IRIDIUM_EverythingForSale_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: The Corporate Sector is excellent at research and development and quick to maximize the economic potential of any new discovery. They have many ways to fill up the treasury, and they are well-served to use them: their citizens are happiest when they are wealthy, and dislike being poor.

StringTable.Label: BraveNewUniverse_CampaignDec
StringTable.String: In 2317, Subspace Streaming allowed for travel to parts of the Galaxy previously uncharted by the Civilizations of the Orion Sector. In these distant systems are Civilizations capable of faster-than-light travel and have developed advanced technologies. Among them is the Luxar Dominion, a group of crystalline beings with plans for a vast array of arms.[BR][BR]Tensions rise With so many new players on the galactic stage. Is the Luxar Dominion open to forming alliances, or will they utilize their horrifying Terror Stars to wipe out entire systems?[BR][BR]The situation is delicate; one misstep could lead to an all-out war.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_BraveNewUniverse_Overall_Dec
StringTable.String: The Terran Alliance is at the center of a delicate situation. A misstep could lead to a war that leaves countless dead. All-out war should be avoided by any means necessary. Some conflict may be unavoidable, but it should not be sought out. Achieve an [HS=HS_AllianceVictory]Alliance Victory[/HS] by allying with all other major civilizations.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_TERRAN_Campaign_BraveNewUniverse_StartupDescription
StringTable.String: Through the use of Subspace Streaming, contact has been made with new Civilizations. Among them is the Luxar Dominion, who developed hyperdrive technology independently, as the Terran Alliance did. They seem prominent and powerful.[BR][BR]The Terran Alliance is now in a delicate situation. The Alliance's actions here can shape the relationship between the disparate Civilizations. A misstep here may lead to a devastating war.[BR][BR]The Terran Alliance must use its sway to keep the peace and form healthy relationships.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_TERRAN_Campaign_BraveNewUniverse_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: The Terran Alliance can use diplomacy and military might to influence the civilizations around them. Some conflict may be required, but it should be quelled and avoided whenever possible. Anything but an Influence Victory here threatens all life across the Galaxy.

StringTable.Label: Radioactive_CampaignDec
StringTable.String: 2317, the year the Orion sector contacts an entirely new part of the Galaxy. Among the Civilizations reached is the Cosmic Contaminant, a group of nearly incomprehensible lifeforms known as the Irradiated. The Luxar Dominion attempts to rally allies to help exterminate the Cosmic Contaminant.[BR][BR]The Cosmic Contaminant has not survived for millennia, where all other life decays, to be destroyed by those that can't adapt.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_Radioactive_Overall_Dec
StringTable.String: It's time for the Cosmic Contaminant to do more than survive. The Luxar Dominion has all but ensured there will be no allies among the stars. As other civilizations prepare for war, so should the Cosmic Contaminant. Achieve a [HS=HS_ConquestVictory]Conquest Victory[/HS] by eliminating all other major civilizations.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_ABSOLUTE_Radioactive_StartupDescription
StringTable.String: The Irradiated developed on toxic and radioactive worlds. Where all others wither, they thrive. They are a threatening enigma that has devastated all others they've encountered. Over time, they have only become more effective at turning planets into polluted wastelands.[BR][BR]The Luxar Dominion, all too familiar with the Irradiated, is attempting to rally the newly contacted Civilizations of the Orion sector against what has been termed the Cosmic Contaminant. They can not be allowed to succeed.

StringTable.Label: FACTION_ABSOLUTE_Radioactive_StartupTraitsDescription
StringTable.String: Assume the Cosmic Contaminant will find no allies here. Treat all other Civilizations as hostile. Utilize all the various ways to pollute planets and render them uninhabitable to all but the Irradiated. A war of attrition benefits the Contaminant, who thrive on planets poisoned in the conflict and replenish numbers quickly.

StringTable.Label: ReturnOfKorath_CampaignDec
StringTable.String: 2317, among the upheaval, the Korath Clan returns. The Korath Clan was legendary in the Drengin Empire as shock troops. They were often at the front of any attack and were renowned for their ferocity and viciousness. The Korath Clan believed that all life was inferior to the Drengin and unworthy of existence. They believed anything weak should be eradicated from the universe, deviating sharply from the Drengin Empire's tendency to enthrall groups they saw as lesser. The strife caused by these philosophical differences caused the Korath Clan to break from the Empire. The Korath Clan became even more noteworthy after their contact with the Dread Lords left them physically altered. The Korath Clan believes they are the true Drengin and seek to drive all others to extinction, even the Empire they once served.

StringTable.Label: Campaign_ReturnOfKorath_Overall_Dec
StringTable.String: The only group worthy of survival is the Korath Clan, and the Korath is more than prepared to prove it. The only course is destruction. Achieve a [HS=HS_ConquestVictory]Conquest Victory[/HS] by driving all other major civilizations to extinction in the name of the Korath Clan.
